name: Quick Thief
description:
Quick Thief is the simplest 2D game in which you have to steal things and sell them and try not to get in the eyes of the guards.
The essence of this game is very simple. Your main task is to explore a variety of locations and steal the things you need. But don't think that everything will be very easy. On your way there will be guards who will want to catch you and prevent you from doing your criminal business. Think over your every step and every action and this game will definitely not make you bored!

KEY FEATURES OF THE GAME:
- Large locations.
- Interesting and simple gameplay.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Unforgettable atmosphere.
